ModMetaData.name: Yautja(Predator) Race
ModMetaData.author: Ogliss + Rebelrot
ModMetaData.description:
V1.2
This mod adds Yautja(Predator) Race from the Predator film franchise to the game as a playale race. Xenomorph race from the Alien film franchise to the game as a enemy race.
textures by Rebelrot Temmy Deon Serpy Derpy
